photo.title: Yoga Kitty keeping fit
photo.description: The Passion of Zeus & Phoebe: A True Love Story. The book is going to be hard-bound with a sewn hard binding and printed on an off-set press with 100+ full color glossy photographs including full-bleed photographs throughout the book and on the front and back covers. Pre-order it here: www.kickstarter.com/projects/zeusandphoebe/the-passion-of... Join us on Facebook - www.facebook.com/pages/Zeus-Pheobe/140646909380458 It doesn't matter where or when, Zeus always does his yoga to stay in shape and ready to chase mice. My son, Sean, who was 8 years old at the time, took this photo while we were driving. I didn't see it until I looked at the camera later. . *************************************************************************************************************** IMPORTANT - My old website, davidawebb.com, is no longer mine. I only created it while I was pursuing an acting career which I am no longer doing. PLEASE disregard that website as it is NO longer associated with me. Is your cats' diet causing it health problems? Read this - www.catinfo.org/ ***************************************************************************************************************************************** A BIG THANK YOU to the team at Google who developed image search. I found this photo on several websites using www.images.google.com. I have NOT authorized anyone to use my photos anywhere. The above photo was illegally copied from here and posted on websites that profit from sale of goods or Ads without compensating me for use of my copyrighted photos. Here is a sample letter I sent to the domain, their web hosting company, Google (for ads or blogging) and Yahoo: Attn: Copyright Agent, (name of offending website here and its hosting companies); Pursuant to 17 USC 512(c)(3)(A), this communication serves as a statement that: I am, David Webb, copyright owner of www.flickr.com/photos/zeusandphoebe/3639362751; My exclusive rights are being violated by material available upon your site at the following URL(s): (copy website URL where photos(s) are found here); I have not authorized my copyrighted photograph to be used on this website; Under penalty of perjury in a United States court of law, I state that the information contained in this notification is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on the behalf of the exclusive rights holder for the material in question; I may be contacted through this email; I hereby request that you remove or disable access to this material as it appears on your service in as expedient a fashion as possible. Thank you. Regards, David Webb Confidentiality Notice: The information contained in this electronic e-mail and any accompanying attachment(s) is intended only for the use of the intended recipient and is non-public in nature and may be confidential and/or privileged. If any reader of this communication is not the intended recipient, unauthorized use, disclosure, dissemination or copying is strictly prohibited, and may be unlawful. If you have received this communication in error, please immediately notify the sender by return e-mail, and delete the original message and all copies from your system and promptly destroy any copies made of this electronic message. Thank you. ==================================================================
